bibl.title: Between Athens and Jerusalem. Jewish Identity in the Hellenistic Diaspora.
bibl.note: Second edition of a study of the Jews who lived in the Hellenistic diaspora, particularly in Egypt. - Non vidimus.
COLLINS John J., Between Athens and Jerusalem. Jewish Identity in the Hellenistic Diaspora.
Grand Rapids, Mich. - Cambridge, U.K., Eerdmans, 2000, 8°, xvi-327 pp. ISBN 0-8028-4372-7. $32 / £19.99.
